titles.title: Hymn 5 - Be glad in the lord and rejoice

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be Glad in Lord and rejoice
All ye that are upright in heart,
And ye that have made Him your choice,
Bid sadness and sorrow depart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Rejoice! Rejoice !
Be glad in the Lord and
Rejoice ! (2ce)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be joyful for He Is the Lord
On earth and in heaven supreme
He fashions and rule by His word
The "mighty" and "Strong" to Redeem

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
What though in conflict for right
Your enemies almost prevail
God's armies , just hid from your sight,
Are more tha the foes which assail.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Though darkness surround you by day,
Your sky by the the night be o'ercast;
Let nothing your spirit dismay
But trust till the danger is past

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Be glad in the Lord and rejoice
His praises proclaiming in song
With harp and with organ and voice
The Lord hallelujah prolong!
